photoModal.title: Photo Examples
photoModal.incorrectDescription: This photo has several issues: the garment is hanging which creates wrinkles and shadows, the background is busy and distracting, the lighting is dim and unnatural. The dress details, fabric texture, and true colors are not clearly visible.
photoModal.correctDescription: Excellent example! The dress is laid flat showing its natural shape, clean white background eliminates distractions, natural lighting reveals true colors and fabric details. Every seam, texture, and design element is crystal clear.
photoModal.tip1: Ensure all product details are clearly visible
photoModal.tip2: Use natural lighting for best results
photoModal.tip4: Take multiple angles for better results
